channel.title: ± WildyScape v3.2 Project ±
channel.description:
[b]WILDYSCAPE PROJECT[/b]
[b]coders[/b] ~Wildy ~
[u][b]SERVER ACIVEMENTS[/b][/u] ~Made server load and save all characater info to a database ~fixed all staffs ~made a staff auto caster ~added premium membership ~fixed a few spells ~Added global objects ~added a dialog handler ~added a lag counter ~Added some other stuff im just to lazy to list em all :P
[u][b]SERVER GOALS[/b][/u] ~new starting are ~full theiving ~fully working projectiles ~full castle wars ~proper clan system ~Highscores pagefor my website (using mysql) ~making it so people have to go to my website to register to play ~making the forums so people can login with the forums account ~more premium membership advantages ~making server more difficult to get money ~adding some random events ~ THERE ARE OTHER THINGS I WANT TO ADD I JUST CANT THINK OF EM ATM...
[b]NOTE: i have a really good dedicated server it hase a Core 2 Duo processer, 1gb ram, 250gb hard disk, 6-12mb ps internet connection, 64bit windows OS, and it has mysql and everything! :)[/b]
If you would like to help me complete this server fill out the aplication below: [code] email: rank: expeireince: proof: [/code]
Oh and just so u know i dont need a nooby coder that likes to spawn 1m objects in one area and expect it not to lag like hell i need a good experianced coder who knows what their doing!
